thread.title: The 25 Best Comedies On Netflix Right Now: Funniest Movies, Ranked
thread.title_full: The 25 Best Comedies On Netflix Right Now: Funniest Movies, Ranked

author: Alyssa Fikse
title: The 25 Best Comedies On Netflix Right Now: Funniest Movies, Ranked
text:
By: ErkTheRed 01.19.2017 @ 9:13 PM 
Whoever wrote this got Beverly Hills Cop all wrong He didn’t lose his position and he def didn’t become a security guard! If you saw the movie you’d know that he was “on vacation”!!(and also investigating the murder of his friend) By: Layla Arcoub 01.07.2017 @ 1:17 AM 
This is the worst list i’ve ever read. More than half of these movies are either romance or drama. Very misleading By: Fuckoff 01.01.2017 @ 6:35 AM 
Who the fuck made this list, I can not believe you guys paid somebody to make this bullshit list. Mother fuck me right? What a waste of time. By: UndertakerandKanesBro 12.13.2016 @ 12:26 PM 
I just watched “Undecided:The Movie” a few days ago. Two guys mess with all the 2016 presidential candidates while posing as undecided voters. Sorta like Borat did. It was funny! Also, I think Airplane! is on Netflix and that would be a criminal omission.
